issue.title: [CF 122] Buffs casted from outside of your group
issue.body:
3.0.4a

If you set up an icon to show a specific buff, and that buff is cast to you from outside of your party, the icon will not light up.

Easy Example:

You're doing Dailies of some kind and a paladin casts Might on you expecting you to cast Mark of the Wild on them.  You have TellMeWhen setup to show when you have the Might buff, but because this Paladin was not in your group when he gave you the buff, the icon does not show.

I've tested this with other buffs as well and none will light up the icon if the buff is provided to you by someone not in your group.


> Posted by CurseForge user Kazrot | Imported from CurseForge issue #122 | Raw

comments.body:
Some screenshots would help on this one, because TMW just simply does not work this way. The only filtering based on who casted a buff is the 'Only show when cast by self' option.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
